casebody.data:
State
v.
Dakota Covington 127P16-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. June 9, 2016

Dakota Covington, Pro Se.

Robert C. Montgomery, Special Deputy Attorney General, Trey Robison, District Attorney, For State of N.C.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 4th of April 2016 by Defendant for Evidentiary Hearing:

*383"Motion Dismissed by order of the Court in conference, this the 9th of June 2016."
